actions.name: CreateChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new channel

actions.name: CreateProgram
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new program on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: CreateSourceLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new source location

actions.name: CreateVodSource
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new VOD source on the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: DeleteChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: DeleteChannelPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the IAM policy on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: DeletePlaybackConfiguration
actions.description: Deletes the playback configuration for the specified name

actions.name: DeleteProgram
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the program with the specified program name on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: DeleteSourceLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: DeleteVodSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the VOD source with the specified VOD source name on the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: DescribeChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: DescribeProgram
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the program with the specified program name on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: DescribeSourceLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: DescribeVodSource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the VOD source with the specified VOD source name on the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: GetChannelPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to read the IAM policy on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: GetChannelSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the schedule of programs on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: GetPlaybackConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the configuration for the specified name

actions.name: ListAlerts
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of alerts on a resource

actions.name: ListChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing channels

actions.name: ListPlaybackConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of available configurations

actions.name: ListSourceLocations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing source locations

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Returns a list of the tags assigned to the specified playback configuration resource

actions.name: ListVodSources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of existing VOD sources on the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: PutChannelPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to set the IAM policy on the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: PutPlaybackConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new configuration

actions.name: StartChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to start the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: StopChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to stop the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Adds tags to the specified playback configuration resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Removes tags from the specified playback configuration resource

actions.name: UpdateChannel
actions.description: Grants permission to update the channel with the specified channel name

actions.name: UpdateSourceLocation
actions.description: Grants permission to update the source location with the specified source location name

actions.name: UpdateVodSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update the VOD source with the specified VOD source name on the source location with the specified source location name
